post:
VPSSLIM.com can offer you very affordable Virtual Private Servers without any contracts!

Want to become a reseller? Contact our Sales department for reseller access! Resellers benefit from an attractive offer!

Each VPS is connected to a 1 Gbps uplink!

We also offer DDOS-Filtering which you can choose with your VPS configuration.

DDoS protection
Up to 10Gbps / 6.000.000 PPS DDoS protection is possible to this VPS sale. Packages you can upgrade or order through the client control panel. Unlike many competitors, our datacenter is using his own in-line scrubbing solution. Your data traffic will not hit any other external network or scrubbing cloud. It speeds up your protection and gives you low latency protection when you are under attack and your datatraffic does not leave our trustful internal datacenter network. We transparently add the DDoS filter between your IP and the internet. All incoming ip datatraffic goes through the filter, also when you do not have a attack. By this the filter know exactly what your normal traffic is and knows the difference between a incoming attack. It will act directly when a DDoS started and the chance of false filtering is minimal. Therefore it's the best filtering solution for Enterprise cloud, Telecom, Gaming, low latency voip infrastructures. More information: http://hostslim.eu/ddos-protection

Why choose us?
- 24/7 support.
- Fast servers.
- 99,99% uptime.
- Professional and very fast support.
- motivated and friendly staff.
- Full N+1 redundancy
- Pay online with paypal and be directly online!
- We OWN all our hardware and equipment
- 7 days money back guarantee
- HostSlim is A FindMyHost EDITORS' CHOICE AWARD WINNER

Features:
» Storage: Hardware RAID10
» OS: Linux
» Distribution: Debian 4/5/6 (32/64 bit), ubuntu 10.04/11.10/12.04 (32/64 bit), centos 5/6 (32/64 bit)... and much more!
» Control Panel: SolusVM
» Virtualization: OpenVZ
» Supported: TUN/TAP/PPP/FUSE
» IPv4: 1
» IPv6: 2 or more on request

Some Q/A, which are frequently asked:
- Is VPN allowed? - Yes for personal use.
- Is TUN/TAP/PPP enabled? - Yes.
- Is adult hosting allowed? - Yes.
- Can I add extra IP addresses? - Yes you can order them additionally.
- Do you own the servers? - Yes, we OWN all our hardware and equipment.
- Do you have a money back guarantee? - Yes we have a 7 days money back guarantee.
- Is there a contract? - No contract, all our products are prepaid!
